name: Blasty block - Winter wonderland
description:
►Click on 2+ blocks of the same color to blast

►Pop more blocks at once for unique abilities 
   * 5 - identical colors creates "Vertical bomb or horizontal"
   * 6 - creates a bomb (destroys adjacent blocks)
   * 7 - colored bomb (destroys all blocks of a certain color)

► Combine abilities to get an improved effect
   * 2 colored bombs will blast all normal blocks
   * 2 vertical bombs will destroy three vertical rows
   * 2 horizontal bombs destroy three horizontal rows

► open more challenging levels
► lovely graphics
► Beautiful animation
► Exciting gameplay
